17#include <sys/types.h>
18
19#include <limits.h>
20
21#include "compat.h"
22
23int
24getptmfd(void)
25{
26 return (INT_MAX);
27}
28
29pid_t
30fdforkpty(__unused int ptmfd, int *master, char *name, struct termios *tio,
31 struct winsize *ws)
32{
33 return (forkpty(master, name, tio, ws));
34}
